participant_1.background:
I love to see the excitement on my students' faces when they learn something new.
I wish I could say that I do, but my health is more important.
I enjoy reading books to distract myself from pain.
i love to read and relax by the lake on the weekends.
I had a lot of happy memories playing with my siblings.

participant_2.background:
I would love to have lunch with Murasaki Shikibu, the author of The Tale of Genji, to learn more about her writing process and the inspiration for her work.
I love music and I like to keep my files organized.
Last year I played video games while I worked on my masters degree.
the kids will be my responsibility as my husband does not want them.
I remember singing "Intergalactic" with my friends in the car, despite my terrible singing voice.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
I am doing well, how about you?
I am doing great, thanks! I am reading a book right now called "The Tale of Genji."
Oh, I love that book! I read it last year.
That's awesome! I am really enjoying it so far.
I am glad to hear that. I would love to have lunch with Murasaki Shikibu, the author of the book, to learn more about her writing process and the inspiration for her work.
That would be amazing! I would love to go to lunch with her too. She is such an inspiring writer.
Yes, she is! I also love music and I like to keep my files organized.
That's cool! I love music too. I play the piano and I love to sing.
That's awesome! I wish I could play the piano. I love to sing too.
I am glad to hear that! I used to sing in a choir when I was in school.
That's awesome! I remember singing "Intergalactic" with my friends in the car, despite my terrible singing voice.
Haha, that's great! I am sure you are a great singer.
Thank you! I think you are a great singer too!
